name: Maze Escape (itch) (Seregfea, NikkoFA, oeloe1)
description:
In Maze Escape you can play with up to four players locally! Three of the players have to find the exit inside of the maze, while one of the players acts as the killer and needs to hunt down the rest.

As a side note: this is not a finished product by any means as we made this game during the Klagenfurt Winter Game Jam (2020/2021). So there are still bugs left and we also weren't able to implement a lot of stuff that we wanted to due to some unfortunate mishaps, but nevertheless we hope you enjoy!
